rules_text:
Hexproof
{2}{G}{G}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature’s power or toughness, whichever is higher. Then draw cards equal to the sacrificed creature’s power or toughness, whichever is lower. [i](If the sacrificed creature’s power and toughness are equal, the amount of life you gain and cards you draw is equal.)[/i]
